data.architecture:
## Sharing & Friends Feature Architecture

### Clean Architecture Layers

```
lib/features/sharing/
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ domain/                          # Business Logic Layer
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ entities/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_relationship.dart  # SharingRelationship entity
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ shared_user_stats.dart      # SharedUserStats entity
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ repositories/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_repository.dart     # Abstract interface
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ usecases/
‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ get_relationships_usecase.dart
‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ send_sharing_request_usecase.dart
‚îÇ       ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ accept_request_usecase.dart
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ get_shared_stats_usecase.dart
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ data/                            # Data Layer
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ models/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_relationship_model.dart  # JSON serialization
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ shared_user_stats_model.dart
‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ datasources/
‚îÇ   ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_remote_datasource.dart   # API calls
‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ repositories/
‚îÇ       ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_repository_impl.dart     # Implementation
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ presentation/                    # UI Layer
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ providers/
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_state.dart       # Immutable state
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ sharing_provider.dart    # StateNotifier
    ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ screens/
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ friends_screen.dart      # Main list
    ‚îÇ   ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ friend_detail_screen.dart # Detail view
    ‚îÇ   ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ add_friend_screen.dart   # Add friend
    ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ widgets/
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ friend_list_item.dart
        ‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ pending_request_card.dart
        ‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ stats_comparison_widget.dart
```

### State Management Pattern (Riverpod)

```dart
// Provider hierarchy
sharingRepositoryProvider ‚Üí SharingRepository
sharingProvider ‚Üí StateNotifier<SharingState>

// Usage in widgets
final state = ref.watch(sharingProvider);
ref.read(sharingProvider.notifier).loadRelationships();
```

### API Integration Contract

| Endpoint | Method | Description |
|----------|--------|-------------|
| /sharing/relationships | GET | Get all relationships |
| /sharing/request | POST | Send friend request |
| /sharing/relationships/:id/accept | POST | Accept request |
| /sharing/relationships/:id/reject | POST | Reject request |
| /sharing/relationships/:id | DELETE | Remove relationship |
| /sharing/stats/:friendId | GET | Get friend's stats |
| /sharing/stats | GET | Get all friends' stats |

### Dependency Injection

```dart
// Registration order in injection_container.dart
sl.registerLazySingleton<SharingRemoteDataSource>(
  () => SharingRemoteDataSource(apiClient: sl<ApiClient>()),
);
sl.registerLazySingleton<SharingRepository>(
  () => SharingRepositoryImpl(remoteDataSource: sl<SharingRemoteDataSource>()),
);
```

### Navigation Routes

| Path | Name | Screen |
|------|------|--------|
| /friends | friends | FriendsScreen |
| /friends/:id | friendDetail | FriendDetailScreen |
| /friends/add | addFriend | AddFriendScreen |

### SOLID Compliance
- **SRP**: Each use case has single responsibility
- **OCP**: Repository interface allows different implementations
- **LSP**: Models extend entities properly
- **ISP**: Small, focused interfaces
- **DIP**: Depends on abstractions (SharingRepository interface)

### Setup Commands
```bash
flutter pub get
```

### Verification Commands
```bash
flutter analyze
flutter test
```

stories.title: Create domain entities and repository interface in lib/features/sharing/domain/
stories.description:
Create the domain layer foundation for the Sharing feature following Clean Architecture patterns.

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Follow `StepStats` pattern from `lib/features/steps/domain/entities/step_stats.dart` for entities
- Use `Equatable` for value-based equality
- Follow `StepsRepository` pattern from `lib/features/steps/domain/repositories/steps_repository.dart` for repository interface
- Use `abstract interface class` for repository definition

üì¶ **REQUIRED ENTITIES:**

**SharingRelationship** entity with fields:
- `id`: String - Unique relationship ID
- `userId`: String - Current user ID
- `friendId`: String - Friend's user ID
- `friendName`: String - Friend's display name
- `friendEmail`: String - Friend's email
- `status`: SharingStatus enum (pending, accepted, rejected)
- `direction`: SharingDirection enum (sent, received)
- `permissions`: List<SharingPermission> enum (viewSteps, viewGoals, viewStats)
- `createdAt`: DateTime
- `updatedAt`: DateTime

**SharedUserStats** entity with fields:
- `userId`: String
- `userName`: String
- `todaySteps`: int
- `goalSteps`: int
- `weeklyAverage`: double
- `percentComplete`: double
- `lastUpdated`: DateTime

**SharingRepository** interface with methods:
- `Future<List<SharingRelationship>> getRelationships()` - Get all relationships
- `Future<SharingRelationship> sendRequest(String email, List<SharingPermission> permissions)` - Send friend request
- `Future<SharingRelationship> acceptRequest(String relationshipId)` - Accept request
- `Future<void> rejectRequest(String relationshipId)` - Reject request
- `Future<void> removeRelationship(String relationshipId)` - Remove friend
- `Future<SharedUserStats> getSharedStats(String friendId)` - Get friend's stats
- `Future<List<SharedUserStats>> getAllSharedStats()` - Get all friends' stats

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Do NOT add JSON serialization to domain entities (that's for data layer models)
- Do NOT implement repository in domain layer
- Do NOT import data or presentation layer files

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/domain/
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given the sharing domain entities, When I import SharingRelationship, Then it should extend Equatable with all required fields
Given the sharing domain entities, When I import SharedUserStats, Then it should extend Equatable with all required fields
Given the sharing repository interface, When I import SharingRepository, Then it should define all required async methods
Given the domain layer, When I run flutter analyze, Then there should be no errors or warnings

stories.title: Create domain use cases in lib/features/sharing/domain/usecases/
stories.description:
Create all use cases for the Sharing feature following the Single Responsibility Principle.

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Follow `GetTodayStepsUseCase` pattern from `lib/features/steps/domain/usecases/get_today_steps_usecase.dart`
- Each use case is a `final class` with constructor injection of repository
- Implement callable pattern with `call()` method
- Add comprehensive dartdoc comments

üì¶ **REQUIRED USE CASES:**

**GetRelationshipsUseCase**:
- Constructor: `GetRelationshipsUseCase({required SharingRepository repository})`
- Method: `Future<List<SharingRelationship>> call()` - calls `repository.getRelationships()`

**SendSharingRequestUseCase**:
- Constructor: `SendSharingRequestUseCase({required SharingRepository repository})`
- Method: `Future<SharingRelationship> call(String email, List<SharingPermission> permissions)` - calls `repository.sendRequest()`

**AcceptRequestUseCase**:
- Constructor: `AcceptRequestUseCase({required SharingRepository repository})`
- Method: `Future<SharingRelationship> call(String relationshipId)` - calls `repository.acceptRequest()`

**GetSharedStatsUseCase**:
- Constructor: `GetSharedStatsUseCase({required SharingRepository repository})`
- Method: `Future<SharedUserStats> call(String friendId)` - calls `repository.getSharedStats()`

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Do NOT add business logic beyond delegation to repository
- Do NOT import data or presentation layer
- Do NOT create use cases with multiple responsibilities

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/domain/usecases/
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given GetRelationshipsUseCase, When call() is invoked, Then it should delegate to repository.getRelationships()
Given SendSharingRequestUseCase, When call(email, permissions) is invoked, Then it should delegate to repository.sendRequest()
Given AcceptRequestUseCase, When call(relationshipId) is invoked, Then it should delegate to repository.acceptRequest()
Given GetSharedStatsUseCase, When call(friendId) is invoked, Then it should delegate to repository.getSharedStats()

stories.title: Create data layer models, datasource, and repository implementation in lib/features/sharing/data/
stories.description:
Create the data layer for the Sharing feature with JSON serialization and API integration.

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Follow `StepModel` pattern from `lib/features/steps/data/models/step_model.dart` for models
- Models extend domain entities and add `fromJson`/`toJson`
- Use `ApiClient` for HTTP calls via constructor injection
- Follow exception patterns from `lib/core/errors/exceptions.dart`

üì¶ **REQUIRED FILES:**

**SharingRelationshipModel** (`sharing_relationship_model.dart`):
- Extends `SharingRelationship`
- `factory fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json)`
- `Map<String, dynamic> toJson()`
- `factory fromEntity(SharingRelationship entity)`

**SharedUserStatsModel** (`shared_user_stats_model.dart`):
- Extends `SharedUserStats`
- `factory fromJson(Map<String, dynamic> json)`
- `Map<String, dynamic> toJson()`

**SharingRemoteDataSource** (`sharing_remote_datasource.dart`):
- Constructor: `SharingRemoteDataSource({required ApiClient apiClient})`
- All HTTP calls using `_apiClient.get()`, `_apiClient.post()`, `_apiClient.delete()`
- Throw `ServerException` on errors
- Methods: `getRelationships()`, `sendRequest()`, `acceptRequest()`, `rejectRequest()`, `removeRelationship()`, `getSharedStats()`, `getAllSharedStats()`

**SharingRepositoryImpl** (`sharing_repository_impl.dart`):
- Implements `SharingRepository`
- Constructor: `SharingRepositoryImpl({required SharingRemoteDataSource remoteDataSource})`
- Delegates to datasource with proper model conversion

**Update ApiEndpoints** (`lib/core/constants/api_endpoints.dart`):
- Add sharing endpoints section:
  - `static const String sharingRelationships = '/sharing/relationships'`
  - `static String sharingRequest = '/sharing/request'`
  - `static String acceptSharingRequest(String id) => '/sharing/relationships/$id/accept'`
  - `static String rejectSharingRequest(String id) => '/sharing/relationships/$id/reject'`
  - `static String removeSharingRelationship(String id) => '/sharing/relationships/$id'`
  - `static String sharedStats(String friendId) => '/sharing/stats/$friendId'`
  - `static const String allSharedStats = '/sharing/stats'`

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Do NOT put business logic in data layer (only data transformation)
- Do NOT use raw Dio - always use ApiClient
- Do NOT catch exceptions in repository (let them propagate)

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/data/
flutter analyze lib/core/constants/api_endpoints.dart
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given SharingRelationshipModel, When fromJson is called with valid JSON, Then it should create a model with all fields populated
Given SharingRemoteDataSource, When getRelationships is called, Then it should make GET request to /sharing/relationships endpoint
Given SharingRepositoryImpl, When methods are called, Then it should delegate to datasource and convert models to entities
Given ApiEndpoints, When importing, Then all sharing endpoints should be available as static constants

stories.title: Create presentation providers, state, DI registration, and router configuration
stories.description:
Create the state management layer and configure dependency injection and routing.

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Follow `StepsNotifier` pattern from `lib/features/steps/presentation/providers/steps_provider.dart`
- Follow `StepsState` pattern from `lib/features/steps/presentation/providers/steps_state.dart`
- Follow DI pattern from `lib/core/di/injection_container.dart` using GetIt `sl`
- Use `StateNotifierProvider` with repository override pattern

üì¶ **REQUIRED FILES:**

**SharingState** (`sharing_state.dart`):
- Immutable state class extending Equatable
- Fields: `status` (SharingStatus enum), `isLoading`, `relationships`, `pendingRequests`, `acceptedFriends`, `sharedStats`, `selectedFriendStats`, `errorMessage`, `lastUpdated`
- Factory constructors: `initial()`, `loading()`
- `copyWith()` method with clear flags
- Computed getters: `hasData`, `hasError`, `pendingCount`, `friendsCount`

**SharingNotifier** (`sharing_provider.dart`):
- Extends `StateNotifier<SharingState>`
- Constructor injects all use cases
- Methods: `loadRelationships()`, `sendRequest()`, `acceptRequest()`, `rejectRequest()`, `loadFriendStats()`, `refresh()`, `clearError()`, `reset()`
- Providers: `sharingRepositoryProvider`, `sharingProvider`

**Update injection_container.dart**:
- Add `_registerSharingDependencies()` function
- Register: `SharingRemoteDataSource`, `SharingRepositoryImpl`
- Call from `configureDependencies()`

**Create app_router.dart** (`lib/core/router/app_router.dart`):
- Move router from app.dart to dedicated file
- Add routes:
  - `/friends` ‚Üí FriendsScreen (name: 'friends')
  - `/friends/:id` ‚Üí FriendDetailScreen (name: 'friendDetail')
  - `/friends/add` ‚Üí AddFriendScreen (name: 'addFriend')
- Export GoRouter instance

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Do NOT use `Provider.autoDispose` for shared state that persists across screens
- Do NOT mutate state directly - always use `state = state.copyWith()`
- Do NOT register repositories directly - register datasources first

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/presentation/providers/
flutter analyze lib/core/di/injection_container.dart
flutter analyze lib/core/router/
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given SharingState, When copyWith is called, Then a new immutable state with updated fields should be returned
Given SharingNotifier.loadRelationships, When called, Then state should transition from loading to loaded with relationships data
Given injection_container.dart, When configureDependencies is called, Then SharingRemoteDataSource and SharingRepositoryImpl should be registered
Given app_router.dart, When imported, Then routes for /friends, /friends/:id, /friends/add should be available

stories.title: Create presentation screens and widgets in lib/features/sharing/presentation/
stories.description:
Create all UI screens and reusable widgets for the Sharing & Friends feature.

üîß **PATTERNS TO USE:**
- Use shared widgets from `lib/shared/widgets/` (AppCard, AppButton, LoadingIndicator, ErrorWidget, EmptyStateWidget)
- Use Riverpod `ConsumerWidget` or `ConsumerStatefulWidget` for state access
- Use `ref.watch(sharingProvider)` for reactive state
- Use `ref.read(sharingProvider.notifier)` for actions
- Follow Material 3 design with Theme.of(context)

üì¶ **REQUIRED SCREENS:**

**FriendsScreen** (`friends_screen.dart`):
- AppBar with title 'Friends' and add button (navigates to AddFriendScreen)
- Tab bar: 'Friends' | 'Pending'
- Friends tab: ListView of FriendListItem widgets
- Pending tab: ListView of PendingRequestCard widgets
- Pull-to-refresh with RefreshIndicator
- Empty states using EmptyStateWidget
- Loading state using LoadingIndicator
- Error state using ErrorWidget with retry

**FriendDetailScreen** (`friend_detail_screen.dart`):
- AppBar with friend name and remove action
- Friend info card (name, email, status)
- StatsComparisonWidget showing your stats vs friend stats
- Permission toggles (view steps, view goals, view stats)
- Remove friend button with confirmation dialog

**AddFriendScreen** (`add_friend_screen.dart`):
- AppBar with title 'Add Friend'
- Email input field with validation
- Permission checkboxes (what to share)
- Send request button
- Success/error feedback

üì¶ **REQUIRED WIDGETS:**

**FriendListItem** (`friend_list_item.dart`):
- AppCard wrapper with onTap navigation
- Avatar (CircleAvatar with initials)
- Name and email text
- Today's steps comparison (your steps vs their steps)
- Status indicator chip

**PendingRequestCard** (`pending_request_card.dart`):
- AppCard wrapper
- Direction indicator (sent/received)
- User info (name, email)
- For received: Accept/Reject buttons
- For sent: 'Pending...' status with cancel option
- Timestamp of request

**StatsComparisonWidget** (`stats_comparison_widget.dart`):
- Side-by-side comparison layout
- Your stats column | Friend stats column
- Metrics: Today's steps, Goal progress, Weekly average
- Visual progress indicators
- 'Winning' indicator for higher stats

‚ö†Ô∏è **ANTI-PATTERNS TO AVOID:**
- Do NOT create custom widgets when shared widgets exist
- Do NOT use `ref.read` in build method (use `ref.watch`)
- Do NOT hardcode colors - use `Theme.of(context).colorScheme`
- Do NOT hardcode strings - prepare for localization

**VERIFICATION:**
```bash
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/presentation/screens/
flutter analyze lib/features/sharing/presentation/widgets/
```
acceptanceCriteria: Given FriendsScreen, When loaded, Then it should display tabs for Friends and Pending with appropriate lists
Given FriendDetailScreen, When navigated to with friendId, Then it should display friend info and StatsComparisonWidget
Given AddFriendScreen, When email is entered and request sent, Then it should call sendRequest and show feedback
Given FriendListItem, When tapped, Then it should navigate to FriendDetailScreen with friend data
Given PendingRequestCard for received request, When Accept is tapped, Then it should call acceptRequest on provider
Given StatsComparisonWidget, When rendered with both user stats, Then it should display side-by-side comparison
